page.title: 15THE FRIENDLY CLUB
page.content:
The Club meets on the first Thursday of the month in Souldrop{Village Hall. It was originally intended for the older people within the village itself, but people also come now from the villages around.
The Club takes responsibility for running the annual{street fair}held in the high street and on the village green on a Saturday in June. There are usually about twenty stalls, some run by people from Sharnbrook. The proceeds are used to finance outings and a Christmas party, any surplus being given to national or local {charities.}Refreshments (teas etc.) are sold in gardens. Stalls include cakes, groceries, garden produce, plants, bric-a-brac,books,crafts,rag dolls and a tombola.
